name: battles
description: Get the battle stats of a user

user.name: user
user.description: Get the battles of the specified Discord User

address.name: id
address.description: Get the battles of the specified User ID or Ronin Address

request_failed.title: Request Failed
request_failed.description:
Couldn't fetch user's recent arena battles.
Please try again later.

no_recent_battles.title: No Recent Battles
no_recent_battles.description: User has no recent arena battles available.

no_profile.title: Request Failed
no_profile.description: Couldn't transform the Ronin Address to User ID
